categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Carter Escalon was an Alliance to Restore the Republic agent. While carrying intelligence data from Coruscant, Escalon was captured by Imperial forces. The Imperials did not find the stolen data, because Escalon stored it in a Swift 78B Vessel Courier System, but did sentence him to a spice-mining prison on Sevarcos II. Escalon was rescued by an Alliance Special Operations team aided by the Sevari nomad Jax Seldam.
